com.weebly.opus1269.clipman.model

Class ClipDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.weebly.opus1269.clipman.model.ClipDatabaseHelper

  • public class ClipDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    A helper class to manage the Clips.db database creation and version management.
